synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with CH2Cl2 three times over a 12 hours period, then with benzene several times and soaked in benzene overnight
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: freeze-dried after being evacuated under a dynamic vacuum for 24 h, kept under vacuum at room temperature for another 12 h, and then heated under vacuum at 60 °C for 10 h
synthesis_conditions.crystal_morphology: yellow-red crystals with thin-plate or feather-like shapes

ligand_synthesis.procedure: cis-[Ru(bpy)2Cl2] mixed with 2,2’-bipyridine 5,5’-dicarboxylated acid in EtOH/H2O, refluxed for 12 hours under Ar protection
